## PrettyBytes.Options.bits property

Format the number as bits instead of bytes. This can be useful when, for example, referring to bit rate.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
readonly bits?: boolean;
```

## Example


```ts
import { prettyBytes } from '@nipem/utils';
P(1337, {bits: true});
//=> '1.34 kbit'
```
